title: 9News Adelaide | Thursday February 26 | Full Episode
description: A rare and dangerous tropical rainstorm expected to lash South Australia, bringing intense downpours and the risk of flash flooding. Residents are urged to prepare as Sunday afternoon is predicted to bring significant rainfall across metropolitan suburbs. Beyond the weather, the state coroner calls for stricter life jacket laws following eight drowning deaths, while police investigate a suspicious fire at Seacombe Gardens. title: 9News Melbourne | Thursday February 26 | Full Episode
description: A high-stakes freedom bid for accused high country killer Greg Lynn as his legal team argues that intense media scrutiny has compromised his right to a fair trial. The broadcast moves into a significant legislative shift in Victoria, where 14-year-olds facing serious violent charges will now be tried in adult courts, sparking a heated debate between the Allan government and the opposition over legal loopholes. International tension also takes center stage with an exclusive look at the plight of Australian children in Syrian camps and rising nuclear anxieties between Iran and the United States.
